verses.1: Ahaziahʼ nu Athaliah in a tapa a sihna a theih ciangin amah kipanin kumpi innkuan khempeuh thatsak hi.
verses.2: Ahih hangin Ahaziahʼ sanggamnu, Kumpi Joramʼ tanu Jehosheba in Ahaziahʼ tapa Joash la-in, thah dingin a kikoih kumpipaʼ tapate lak panin amah gu khia a, biakinn sung lupna inn dei sungah amah le a cingnu a koih hi. Tua bangin tua nu in Athaliah kiang panin amah seel a, tua ahih manin amah kithat kha lo hi.
verses.3: Athaliah in Israel gam sungah a uk sungteng a cingnu tawh amah kum guk sung omin Topaʼ biakinn sungah a bu hi.
verses.4: Ahih hangin a kum sagihna kumin siampi Jehoiada in mi sawlin Kar mite le kumpi inncing a ukte kiangah paisak a, Topaʼ biakinn sung ama kiangah samsak hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute tungah a ngaihsutna genin Topaʼ biakinn sungah kiciamna khat bawl uh a, amah in amaute kiangah kumpipaʼ tapa a lak hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin amah in amaute thu pia a, “Note hih bangin na gamta ding uh hi: Sabbath ni-in nasep pengin kumpipa inn a cing no seh thum ah seh khatte in
verses.6: (a dang seh thum ah seh khatte Sur kulh kongpi ah omin a dang seh thum ah seh khatte a cingteʼ nung kulh kongpi ah om hi) kumpi inn na cing ding uh hi.
verses.7: Tua ciangin Sabbath ni-in na semin Topaʼ biakinn a cing no a khen nihte in
verses.8: na khut sung uh ah na hiam ciat uh tawh kumpi Joash na cing ding uh hi. Note kiang nai ah a hong pai peuhpeuh kithat ding hi. Kumpipa a paikhiat ciang le a sung tum ciangin amah na cing ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.9: A ukte in siampi Jehoiadaʼ thupiak khempeuh bangin hih uh a, Sabbath ni-in nasep a sem dingte tawh Sabbath ni-in ama mi nasep a peng dingte hong paipih ciat uh a, siampi Jehoiada kiangah hong tung uh hi.
verses.10: Tua ciangin siampipa in a ukte tungah Topaʼ biakinn sungah a om David-aʼ ahi teipite le lumte a pia hi.
verses.11: Tua ciangin biakinn leitaw lam pang, biakna tau le biakinn kimkot ah mi khempeuh a khut uh ah a hiam ciat uh tawh a cingin a ding uh hi.
verses.12: Tua ciangin amah in kumpipaʼ tapa paikhiat pihin, ama lu tungah kumpi lukhu khusak a, kumpi hihna teci panna lai amah a pia hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amah kumpi hi, ci-in taangko-in amah sathau a nilh uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a khut uh bengin, “Kumpipa khansau hen!” a ci uh hi.
verses.13: Athaliah in a cingte le miteʼ gamlumna a zak ciangin miteʼ kiang Topaʼ biakinn sungah a pai hi.
verses.14: Amah a khuadak ciangin a ngeina ding bangin biakna song gei ah kumpi thak pa dingin, kumpipa gei ah a ukte le peengkul tumte om a, tua gam mi khempeuh in lungdamin peengkul na tum uh hi. Tua ciangin Athaliah in a puante bal kekin kiko a, “Sawm simna! Sawm simna!” a ci hi.
verses.15: Tua ciangin siampi Jehoiada in galkap a ukte thu pia-in, “A pua ah tua nu paikhiatpih un. Amah a panpih peuhmah namsau tawh that un,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh siampipa in, “ Topaʼ biakinn sungah amah that kei un,” a ci hi.
verses.16: Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua nu man uh a, Kumpipaʼ inn lutna Sakol Kongpi a tun ciangin tua lai ah amah kithat hi.
verses.17: Tua ciangin Jehoiada in amaute Topaʼ mi ahih nading uh Topa le kumpipa le mite kikalah thuciamna khat bawl a, kumpipa le mite kikalah zong a bawl hi.
verses.18: Tua ciangin tua gam mi khempeuh Baal biakinn ah pai-in a biakinn a phelkek uh hi. A biakna taute le a milimte amaute in sukham uh a, amaute in biakna taute mai ah Baal siampi Mattan a that uh hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in Topaʼ biakinn ah galvilte a koih hi.
verses.19: Tua ciangin amah in a ukte, a cingte le tua gam mi khempeuh kaikhawm hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Topaʼ biakinn panin kumpipa paipih suk uh a, a Cingteʼ Kongpi tawnin kumpipaʼ inn ah a pai uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpiteʼ kumpi tokhom tungah amah hong tu hi.
verses.20: Tua ahih ciangin tua gam mi khempeuh a lungdam uh hi. Kumpipaʼ inn ah namsau tawh Athaliah a kithah khit ciangin khuapi sung a gamdai hi.
verses.21: Joash in uk ding a kipat ciangin ama khan kum sagih pha pan hi.
